name: HarryRabby 2 Find the Missing Negative Number FULL
name_original: HarryRabby 2 Find the Missing Negative Number FULL
description:
Looking to test your kid’s basic math skills? We have what you need here! This special series of HarryRabby 2 includes products for learning different preschool/elementary math topics.

The Preschool/Elementary Learning editions are action packed math games with levels of fun and excitement. Having accessibility in mind, special display and control features are available for low vision gamers. Simple but challenging gameplay, with mobile touch screen support, the games can be played on mobile devices as well as on desktop computers.

The math questions are specifically made for toddlers, preschoolers and elementary learners. Player clicks or touches on the correct answer to a math question in order to allow HarryRabby to land safely and proceed to the next level. The math questions are generated randomly. The full versions have 5 difficulty levels: value within -10, value within -20, value within -30, value within -40, and value within -50. The Free versions have just one difficulty level for you to try out. This product has missing number questions - you need to find the missing negative numbers in the sequences.

Many game elements are adjustable, such as object moving speed and color mode (high contrast, brightness, grayscale, B&W, inversed display…etc).
